column4: I'm going to be installing Ubuntu server as an IRC server on a P IV box with a gig of RAM...would I still be able to use this box as a desktop PC? I'll mostly be web browsing and listening to music (And obviously IRC)
Should I be ok with that?

if you install the ubuntu server edition it doesn't install a desktop environment by default, but you can install it from the repos, or you can install the desktop version and just use that as a server
it's basically for a server box that you wont be sitting in front of, I use server edition for my file server because it is headless
